title: Ep 407 | Missy Gives Jase a Gift with One Unexpected Twist & the Time Jase Met Matthew McConaughey
description:
Missy had a special Christmas surprise for Jase, but with an unexpected twist. Jase recalls the time he bumped into Matthew McConaughey during the 2019 Texas-LSU game. Al describes the cross-references between Matthew 28 and Acts 1, and Jase confronts the false belief that the great commission was only for the twelve disciples. Phil articulates how Jesus revealed his identity as the son of God by performing miracles. And Jase helps remind his friends to remember fellowship over work.

Pre-order your signed copy of Uncanceled by Phil Robertson: https://talkshop.live/watch/QID3D1y77yHJ

Visit http://MarleySpoon.com and use the promo code: PHIL and save $120 off your first 5 boxes

Visit http://Keeps.com/PHIL and get 50% off your first month of hair loss treatment
